item.title: I need an auto random typer
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Oh, if you want my script to type the keys to the game or whatever you’re using this on, change this line:

WriteLn(RandomLetter);

To:

SendKeys(RandomLetter);

Read full topic
item.source: I need an auto random typer

item.title: I need an auto random typer
item.dc:creator: @m0ng00se m0ng00se
item.description:
@m0ng00se wrote:

Here is another one if that one doesnt work right for ya.

//Random ass typer by\\
//------M0ng00se-----\\

program RandomTyper;
Const
waittime=200; // Time in between each typed letter. In milliseconds.

Procedure TypeRandom;
begin
  Case Random(26) of
  0: sendkeys('a');
  1: sendkeys('b');
  2: sendkeys('c');
  3: sendkeys('d');
  4: sendkeys('e');
  5: sendkeys('f');
  6: sendkeys('g');
  7: sendkeys('h');
  8: sendkeys('i');
  9: sendkeys('j');
  10: sendkeys('k');
  11: sendkeys('l');
  12: sendkeys('m');
  13: sendkeys('n');
  14: sendkeys('o');
  15: sendkeys('p');
  16: sendkeys('q');
  17: sendkeys('r');
  18: sendkeys('s');
  19: sendkeys('t');
  20: sendkeys('u');
  21: sendkeys('v');
  22: sendkeys('w');
  23: sendkeys('x');
  24: sendkeys('y');
  25: sendkeys('z');
end;
end;

Begin
repeat
TypeRandom;
wait(waittime);
until(false)
End.

item.source: I need an auto random typer

item.title: I need an auto random typer
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Here ya go. If you want it to return just a lowercase letter, change this line:

RandomLetter:=GetRandomLetter(True);

To:

RandomLetter:=GetRandomLetter(False);

Heres the code:

[code]program New;

var
RandomLetter: String;

function GetRandomLetter(EitherCase:Boolean): String;
var
lowCase, upCase: String;
begin
lowCase:=‘abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz’;
upCase:=‘ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ’;
if EitherCase then
begin
Case random(2) of
0 : Result:=StrGet(lowCase, random(26)+1);
1 : Result:=StrGet(upCase, random(26)+1);
end;
end else
begin
Result:=StrGet(lowCase, random(26)+1);
end;
end;

begin
RandomLetter:=GetRandomLetter(True);//Change the True to False if you want it to return only a lowercase letter.
//If you leave it at True, it will return a letter of either case.
WriteLn(RandomLetter);
end.[/code]

Hope this is what you were looking for. If you got any questions or need somethin else, just tell me.

-Weibs.

Read full topic
